message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $170. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $140?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $155. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly agree on $145 for the product?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to your target price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $152. It's my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $148 for the product?
